role_description: An Ansible role that installs WP-CLI, a command-line interface for WordPress, on nearly any platform
role_description_full_overview: [WP-CLI](https://wp-cli.org/) is the command-line interface for [WordPress](https://wordpress.org/). You can update plugins, configure multisite installations and much more. You can do all this without using a web browser.
role_description_alt: This repository is the home of an Ansible role that installs WP-CLI, a command-line interface for WordPress, on nearly any platform.
